value.title: Can we have ANIMATED Power BI visuals?

value.title: How do you conditionally highlight a bar in a Power BI Report?
value.excerpt: There are different interactions Power BI visuals can have, but how do we conditionally highlight a bar in a Power BI report using a slicer? value.title: Native Query: Be careful when using in Power BI
value.excerpt: Patrick looks at native query and why you should be careful when using it in Power BI. He looks at what native query is, what to consider when using it, and how to monitor what query folding, in Power Query, is or is not doing.  Guy in a Cube Courses: https://guyinacu.be/courses  ******** LET'S CONNECT!

value.title: Power BI dataflows: Where does it fit in? (Matthew Roche schools Patrick)

value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data. value.title: DAX Fridays! #3: SUM and SUMX
value.excerpt: Dax Fridays! Today we will go through: how to use SUM() and SUMX(), the difference between them and when should we use one vs the other.  The DAX SUM function calculates the sum of all numbers in a column while the DAX SUMX function returns the sum of an expression for each row in a table.  02:28 Create
